title: Timboon Consolidated School
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and E.J. Perry
brief_description: Makes an argument for the consolidation of local small rural schools into large purpose built centralised establishments with a post-primary school element. Presents the organisational elements involved: bussing, staffing, design, curriculum etc.
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and E.J. Perry
